title: Do not give away Diego Garcia, Trump tells UK in fresh attack on Chagos deal
summary_full: The president's comments come just a day after the US gave its official backing to the UK's Chagos deal.
summary_public: The president's comments come just a day after the US gave its official backing to the UK's Chagos deal.
